item.description:
What better way to kick off the Meetup new year than with a game of pool, good food and a fun bunch of people?

You've probably seen the looming Snookers sign from the interstate. Besides hosting a number of tables, they also have a great restaurant and bar. Tuesday is Taco and Tequila night where you can get tacos and a margarita for just $5.55 each. (I believe you have to sign up for their rewards card to get the discount.)

So come on down, meet some new people, shoot some pool and hang out.

Look out for us around the pool tables.

Get behind the eight ball and hope to see you there.

******* Thanks to Edie for suggesting this idea. If you have any ideas for a meetup, please send them to Matt or me.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us, we should be easy to find
item.name: Play pool @ Snookers in Providence
